page.title: 05GHOST STORY
page.content: Along Seabank Road at the Dell over looking the beach three sailors would go for a couple of drinks at the Dell quite a few years ago.When ever they were passing they always stopped for a drink and once they all got pushed down into the cells underneath the actual pub and locked probably for punishment.They stayed in there for a few months then they died and left nothing except their clothes.Now when it's nearly dark you can hear them banging on the door and sort of scratching or groaning to get out.
